        text - The String to draw
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at

        public void drawTexture(Texture texture,

        Description copied from interface: Graphics

        Specified by:

        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        width - The width to draw the texture (this can stretch/shrink the texture if not matching the texture's width)

      • drawTextureRegion

        public void drawTextureRegion(TextureRegion textureRegion,
                              float x,
                              float y,
                              float width,
                              float height,
                              float rotation)
        Description copied from interface: Graphics
        Draws a texture region to this graphics context
        Specified by:
        drawTextureRegion in interface Graphics
        Parameters:
        textureRegion - The TextureRegion to draw
        x - The x coordinate to draw at
        y - The y coordinate to draw at
        width - The width to draw the region (this can stretch/shrink the texture if not matching the region's width)
        height - The height to draw the region (this can stretch/shrink the texture if not matching the region's height)
        rotation - The rotation in degrees (rotated around the top-left corner of the region)

        Specified by:
